Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at DoubleTree by Hilton London - Islington in London (Kings Cross St. Pancras), you'll be minutes from Angel Building and Sadler's Wells Theatre. This 4-star hotel is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and King's College London.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 372 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of DoubleTree by Hilton London - Islington. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in London? This hotel has facilities measuring 1808 square feet (168 square meters), including meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of DoubleTree by Hilton London - Islington. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Angel Building - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Sadler's Wells Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
London Canal Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

University of London - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Bloomsbury Square - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Bloomsbury Theatre - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Barbican Arts Centre - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for DoubleTree by Hilton London - Islington is London (LCY-London City) - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
